text: Matteo Piantedosi (born 20 April 1963) is an Italian politician. In October 2022, he became the Minister of the Interior in the Giorgia Meloni government. Before, he was the Prefect of the Province of Lodi for a few months between August 2011 to January 2012. Piantedosi was born in 1963 in Naples, Italy. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Naples
title: Matteo Piantedosi
